content: --कारः {1} egotism, sense of self, self-love considered as an अविद्या or spiritual ignorance in Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>; <ls>Bg. 2. 71</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">7. 4</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 14</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 177.</ls> {2} pride, self-consciousness, self-conceit, haughtiness. {3} (in Sān. <ab>phil.</ab>) the third of the eight producers or elements of creation, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the conceit or conception of individuality, one of the 25 elements; <ls>Sāṅ. K. 22</ls>, <ls n="Sāṅ. K.">24</ls>, <ls n="Sāṅ. K.">25</ls>;
